# 16srDNA_analysis_system: 

This repository was designed to save the pipeline and scripts of analysis of 16 SrRNA gene datasets. Now, we have developed [`MicrobiotaProcess`](https://github.com/YuLab-SMU/MicrobiotaProcess), an R package for analysis, visualization and biomarker discovery of microbiome.
